sqls.sql: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT master_code_id, master_code_key, mc.code_category, code_value, code_description, (SELECT category_description FROM cm_master_code_category where code_category = mc.code_category) as description, filter_value, sequence, remarks, status, effective_from, effective_to, version, is_centrally_manage FROM CM_MASTER_CODE as mc) AS ACM WHERE ACM.STATUS != 'CMSTAT002' <#if id??> AND CHARINDEX(:id, ACM.master_code_id) >0</#if> <#if codeCategory??> AND ACM.description = :codeCategory</#if> <#if codeValue??> AND charindex(:codeValue, ACM.code_value) >0 </#if> <#if codeDescription??> AND charindex(:codeDescription, ACM.code_description) >0 </#if> <#if filterValue??> AND charindex(:filterValue, ACM.filter_value) >0 </#if> <#if esd??> AND cast(ACM.effective_from as date)>= :esd</#if> <#if eed??> AND cast(ACM.effective_to as date) <= :eed</#if> <#if codeStatus??> AND ACM.status = :codeStatus</#if>

SELECT DISTINCT T1.USER_ID,T1.ID,T1.EMAIL_ADDR,T1.DISPLAY_NAME,T1.STATUS from user_account as T1 left join user_role T2 on T1.ID =T2.USER_ACCT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND T1.STATUS !='CMSTAT002' AND T1.USER_DOMAIN = 'intranet' <#if id??> AND CHARINDEX(:id, T1.id) >0</#if> <#if userId??> and charindex(:userId, T1.USER_ID) >0</#if> <#if displayName??> and charindex(:displayName, T1.DISPLAY_NAME) >0</#if> <#if status??> and charindex(:status, T1.STATUS) >0</#if> <#if email??> and charindex(:email, T1.EMAIL_ADDR) >0</#if> <#if role??> and charindex(:role, T2.ROLE_ID) >0</#if>

SELECT master_code_id, master_code_key, (SELECT category_description FROM cm_master_code_category where code_category = t1.code_category) as code_category, code_value, code_description, remarks, status, effective_from, effective_to, version, FROM cm_master_code as t1 WHERE code_category = ( SELECT code_category FROM cm_master_code_category AS cmcc WHERE 1=1 <#if categoryDescription??> AND cmcc.catequeryMessagegory_description = :categoryDescription</#if> ) <#if master_code_id??> AND CHARINDEX(:master_code_id, mc.master_code_id) >0</#if>

SELECT msg_id, code_key, domain_type, msg_type, module, description, message, status FROM CM_MESSAGE WHERE 1=1 AND status = 'CMSTAT001' <#if domainType??> AND domain_type = :domainType</#if> <#if msgType??> AND msg_type = :msgType</#if> <#if module??> AND module = :module</#if>

select pid, domain_type , module, description, units, value, param_type, is_mandatory, can_update , max_length, status, properties_key, UPDATED_DT, UPDATED_BY, VALUE_TYPE from cm_system_parameters where 1=1 and value != 'CMSTAT002' <#if domainType??> and domain_type = :domainType</#if> <#if module??> and module = :module</#if> <#if description??> and charindex(:description, description) >0</#if> <#if units??> and units = :units</#if> <#if value??> and value = :value</#if> <#if param_type??> and param_type = :param_type</#if> <#if is_mandatory??> and is_mandatory = :is_mandatory</#if> <#if can_update??> and can_update = :can_update</#if> <#if max_length??> and max_length = :max_length</#if>
<#if status??> and status = :status</#if>

sql.remarks: query full reocrd for audit trail

sqls.sql: select audit_id,action_time, operation, operation as data_active, case operation when 1 then 'Login' when 2 then 'Logout' when 3 then 'Login Failure' when 4 then 'View Record' when 5 then 'Data Validation Failure' when 6 then 'Insert' when 7 then 'Update' when 8 then 'Delete' when 9 then 'User Account' when 10 then 'Session Timeout' when 11 then 'Inactive Record' when 12 then 'Unauthorised Access Sources' when 13 then 'All Access' when 14 then 'Foreign Interface' else 'unknown' end operation_desc, nric_number, uen_id, entity_id, total_session_duration, moh_user_id, login_type, session_id, client_ip, user_agent, application_number, license_number, module, function_name, programme_name, validation_fail_detail, view_params, failed_reason, [domain], case [domain] when 20001 then 'Batch_Job' when 20002 then 'Intranet' when 20003 then 'Internet' else 'unknown' end domain_desc from at_audit_trail where 1 = 1 <#if operation??> and operation = :operation</#if> <#if nric_number??> and nric_number = :nricnumber</#if> <#if startDate??> and action_time >= :startDate </#if> <#if endDate??> and action_time <= :endDate </#if> <#if operationType??> and [domain] = :operationType </#if> <#if interUser??> and nric_number = :interUser </#if> <#if intraUser??> and moh_user_id = :intraUser </#if> <#if batchJob??> and charindex(:batchJob, entity_id) >0 </#if>

sql.remarks: query data mask for audit trail

sqls.sql: select audit_id,action_time, operation, operation as data_active, case operation when 1 then 'Login' when 2 then 'Logout' when 3 then 'Login Failure' when 4 then 'View Record' when 5 then 'Data Validation Failure' when 6 then 'Insert' when 7 then 'Update' when 8 then 'Delete' when 9 then 'User Account' when 10 then 'Session Timeout' when 11 then 'Inactive Record' when 12 then 'Unauthorised Access Sources' else 'unknown' end operation_desc, nric_number, uen_id, entity_id, total_session_duration, moh_user_id, login_type, session_id, client_ip, user_agent, application_number, license_number, module, function_name, programme_name, validation_fail_detail, view_params, failed_reason, [domain], case [domain] when 20001 then 'Batch_Job' when 20002 then 'Intranet' when 20003 then 'Internet' else 'unknown' end domain_desc from at_audit_trail where 1 = 1 and operation not in(4, 9, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 18, 19, 20, 21, 22, 23, 24 ) <#if operation??> and operation = :operation</#if> <#if nric_number??> and nric_number = :nricnumber</#if> <#if startDate??> and action_time >= :startDate </#if> <#if endDate??> and action_time <= :endDate </#if> <#if operationType??> and [domain] = :operationType </#if> <#if interUser??> and nric_number = :interUser </#if> <#if intraUser??> and moh_user_id = :intraUser </#if> <#if batchJob??> and charindex(:batchJob, entity_id) >0 </#if>

sql.remarks: query hcsa service parameter of checklist

sqls.sql: select stype.id as service_id, scategory.id as category_id, scategory.name as category_name, stype.name as service_name from hcsa_service_type stype, hcsa_service_category scategory where stype.category_id = scategory.id

select item.id as item_id, regulation.clause_no as clause_num, regulation.clause as clause, item.question as checklistitem, item.answer_type as answer_type, item.risk_level as risk_level, item.status as status from chkl_config_hcsa_svc_item_pool item, chkl_config_hcsa_svc_regulation regulation where 1 = 1 and item.regulation_id = regulation.id and item.status = 'cmstat001' <#if itemid??> and charindex(:itemid, item.id) >0</#if> <#if regulationclauseno??> and charindex(:regulationclauseno, regulation.clause_no) >0 </#if> <#if regulationclause??> and charindex(:regulationclause, regulation.clause) >0 </#if> <#if checklistItem??> and charindex(:checklistItem, item.question) >0</#if> <#if answertype??> and item.answer_type = :answertype</#if> <#if risklevel??> and item.risk_level = :risklevel</#if> <#if status??> and item.status = :status</#if>

sql.remarks: query chechlist items by item id

sqls.sql: select item.id as item_id, regulation.clause_no as clause_num, regulation.clause as clause, item.question as checklistitem, item.answer_type as answer_type, item.risk_level as risk_level, item.status as status from chkl_config_hcsa_svc_item_pool item, chkl_config_hcsa_svc_regulation regulation where 1 = 1 and item.regulation_id = regulation.id and item.status = 'cmstat001' <#if itemid??> item.id in(:itemid)</#if>

SELECT * FROM (SELECT mt.id, mt.message_type, mt.template_name, mt.message_content, mt.delivery_mode, mt.effective_from, mt.effective_to, mt.STATUS, (SELECT DISTINCT mtp.process_type FROM message_template_process AS mtp WHERE mtp.message_template_id = mt.ID ) as process FROM message_template AS mt WHERE STATUS = 'CMSTAT001') AS T1 CROSS APPLY ( SELECT RECIPIENT + ', ' FROM message_template_recipient M1 WHERE T1.ID = M1.MESSAGE_TEMPLATE_ID and M1.RECIPIENT_TYPE = 'CC' FOR XML PATH('') ) A (CC) CROSS APPLY ( SELECT RECIPIENT + ', ' FROM message_template_recipient M1 WHERE T1.ID = M1.MESSAGE_TEMPLATE_ID and M1.RECIPIENT_TYPE = 'BCC' FOR XML PATH('') ) B (BCC) CROSS APPLY ( SELECT RECIPIENT + ', ' FROM message_template_recipient M1 WHERE T1.ID = M1.MESSAGE_TEMPLATE_ID and M1.RECIPIENT_TYPE = 'TO' FOR XML PATH('') ) C (REC) WHERE 1=1 <#if id??> and charindex(:id, id) >0</#if> <#if msgType??> AND T1.message_type = :msgType</#if> <#if templateName??> AND charindex(:templateName, T1.template_name) >0 </#if> <#if deliveryMode??> AND T1.delivery_mode = :deliveryMode</#if> <#if tepProcess??> AND T1.process = :tepProcess</#if> <#if esd??> AND T1.effective_from >= :esd</#if> <#if eed??> AND T1.effective_to <= :eed</#if>

select T1.ID AS ID, T1.SRC_SYSTEM_ID AS SRC_SYSTEM_ID, T1.GROUP_SHORT_NAME AS GROUP_SHORT_NAME, T1.START_DATE AS START_DATE, T1.END_DATE AS END_DATE, T1.[DESC] as [DESC], T1.STATUS as STATUS from appt_blackout_date T1, appt_src_system T2 where T1.SRC_SYSTEM_ID = T2.ID AND T1.STATUS = 'CMSTAT001' <#if shortName??> AND T1.GROUP_SHORT_NAME = :shortName</#if> <#if desc??> and charindex(:desc, T1.[DESC]) >0</#if> <#if startDate??> AND (T1.START_DATE BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate</#if> <#if endDate??> OR T1.END_DATE BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate)</#if> <#if status??> AND T1.STATUS = :status</#if> <#if year??> AND T1.START_DATE >= CONVERT(datetime, :year, 20) AND T1.END_DATE <= dateadd(ms,86399990,dateadd(dd, 365, CONVERT(datetime, :year, 20))) </#if>

select DISTINCT T3.ID AS id, T3.group_name as group_name, T3.group_domain AS group_domain, t4.USER_ACCT_ID AS user_id, T3.STATUS AS STATUS from user_group_correlation T1, user_account T2, working_group T3, user_role t4 where t1.user_role_id = t4.id and t4.user_acct_id = t2.id and T2.USER_DOMAIN = 'intranet' and T3.id = T1.group_id and T3.id in('CA82D485-F90C-EA11-BE7D-000C29F371DC', '52FBF1AC-F90C-EA11-BE7D-000C29F371DC', '76E149C0-F90C-EA11-BE7D-000C29F371DC', '1B529DD0-F90C-EA11-BE7D-000C29F371DC') and T1.IS_GRP_LEADER = 1 <#if userId??> AND T2.id = :userId </#if>

select distinct t3.id as id, t3.group_name as group_name, t3.group_domain as group_domain, t2.user_id, t3.status as status from user_group_correlation t1, user_account t2, working_group t3, user_role t4 where t1.user_role_id = t4.id and t4.user_acct_id = t2.id and t2.user_domain = 'intranet' and t3.group_domain = 'hcsa' and t3.id = t1.group_id <#if userId??> AND T2.id = :userId </#if>

select id,FROM_DATE,TO_DATE,PH_CODE,STATUS from public_holiday WHERE 1 = 1 <#if phCode??> AND PH_CODE = :phCode</#if> <#if nonWorking??> AND (FROM_DATE between :nonWorking and :nonWorking)</#if> <#if status??> AND STATUS = :status</#if> <#if year??>AND charindex(:year, FROM_DATE) >0 </#if>

SELECT DISTINCT T3.ID as ID, SUBSTRING(CONVERT(varchar(100),T3.BLOCK_OUT_END, 20), 0,5) AS YEAR, T2.NAME AS NAME, T3.BLOCK_OUT_START as BLOCK_OUT_START, T3.BLOCK_OUT_END AS BLOCK_OUT_END, T3.REMARKS AS REMARKS, T3.RECURRENCE AS RECURRENCE, T3.BLOCK_OUT_END AS RECURRENCE_END_DATE FROM appt_user_system_correlation T1 JOIN appt_agency_user T2 ON T1.AGENCY_USER_ID = T2.ID JOIN appt_user_non_avail T3 ON T1.ID = T3.USER_SYS_CORRE_ID WHERE T3.status = 'CMSTAT001' <#if wrkGroupList??> and ${wrkGroupList} </#if> <#if wrkGroup??> AND T1.GROUP_SHORT_NAME = :wrkGroup </#if> <#if userId??> AND T2.LOGIN_USER_ID = :userId </#if> <#if userName??> AND charindex(:userName, T2.NAME) >0</#if> <#if userBlockDateStart??> AND T3.BLOCK_OUT_START = :userBlockDateStart</#if> <#if userBlockDateEnd??> AND T3.BLOCK_OUT_END = :userBlockDateEnd</#if> <#if userBlockDateDescription??> AND charindex(:userBlockDateDescription, T3.REMARKS) >0 </#if> <#if year??> AND T3.BLOCK_OUT_START >= CONVERT(datetime, :year, 20) AND T3.BLOCK_OUT_END <= dateadd(ms,86399990,dateadd(dd, 365, CONVERT(datetime, :year, 20))) </#if> <#if recurrence??> AND T3.RECURRENCE = :recurrence </#if> <#if recurrenceEndDate??> AND T3.BLOCK_OUT_END = :recurrenceEndDate</#if>

SELECT DISTINCT max(T3.ID) as ID, T2.NAME AS NAME, T3.BLOCK_OUT_START as BLOCK_OUT_START, T3.BLOCK_OUT_END AS BLOCK_OUT_END, T3.REMARKS AS REMARKS, T3.RECURRENCE AS RECURRENCE, T3.BLOCK_OUT_END AS RECURRENCE_END_DATE FROM appt_user_system_correlation T1 JOIN appt_agency_user T2 ON T1.AGENCY_USER_ID = T2.ID JOIN appt_user_non_avail T3 ON T1.ID = T3.USER_SYS_CORRE_ID WHERE T3.status = 'CMSTAT001' <#if wrkGroupList??> and ${wrkGroupList} </#if> <#if wrkGroup??> AND T1.GROUP_SHORT_NAME = :wrkGroup </#if> <#if userId??> AND T2.LOGIN_USER_ID = :userId </#if> <#if userName??> AND charindex(:userName, T2.NAME) >0</#if> <#if userBlockDateStart??> AND T3.BLOCK_OUT_START > CONVERT(datetime, :userBlockDateStart, 103)</#if> <#if userBlockDateEnd??> AND T3.BLOCK_OUT_END < CONVERT(datetime, :userBlockDateEnd, 103)</#if> <#if userBlockDateDescription??> AND charindex(:userBlockDateDescription, T3.REMARKS) >0 </#if> <#if recurrence??> AND T3.RECURRENCE = :recurrence </#if> <#if recurrenceEndDate??> AND T3.BLOCK_OUT_END < CONVERT(datetime, :recurrenceEndDate, 103)</#if> GROUP BY T2.NAME, T3.BLOCK_OUT_START, T3.BLOCK_OUT_END, T3.REMARKS, T3.RECURRENCE, T3.BLOCK_OUT_END

SELECT DISTINCT MAX(TB.ID) AS ID, TB.NAME, SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(100),TB.BLOCK_OUT_END, 20), 0,5) AS [YEAR], TB.BLOCK_OUT_START, TB.BLOCK_OUT_END, TB.REMARKS, TB.RECURRENCE, TB.RECURRENCE_END_DATE FROM ( SELECT T3.ID, T1.GROUP_SHORT_NAME, T2.NAME AS NAME, T3.BLOCK_OUT_START AS BLOCK_OUT_START, T3.BLOCK_OUT_END AS BLOCK_OUT_END, T3.REMARKS AS REMARKS, T3.RECURRENCE AS RECURRENCE, T3.BLOCK_OUT_END AS RECURRENCE_END_DATE FROM APPT_USER_SYSTEM_CORRELATION T1 JOIN APPT_AGENCY_USER T2 ON T1.AGENCY_USER_ID = T2.ID JOIN APPT_USER_NON_AVAIL T3 ON T1.ID = T3.USER_SYS_CORRE_ID WHERE T3.status = 'CMSTAT001' <#if wrkGroupList??> AND ${wrkGroupList} </#if> ) TB WHERE 1 = 1 <#if userName??> AND charindex(:userName, NAME) >0</#if> <#if userBlockDateStart??> AND TB.BLOCK_OUT_START = :userBlockDateStart</#if> <#if userBlockDateEnd??> AND TB.BLOCK_OUT_END = :userBlockDateEnd</#if> <#if userBlockDateDescription??> AND charindex(:userBlockDateDescription, TB.REMARKS) >0 </#if> <#if year??> AND TB.BLOCK_OUT_START >= CONVERT(datetime, :year, 20) AND TB.BLOCK_OUT_END <= dateadd(ms,86399990,dateadd(dd, 365, CONVERT(datetime, :year, 20))) </#if> <#if recurrence??> AND TB.RECURRENCE = :recurrence </#if> <#if recurrenceEndDate??> AND TB.BLOCK_OUT_END = :recurrenceEndDate</#if> GROUP BY TB.NAME, TB.BLOCK_OUT_END,TB.BLOCK_OUT_START, TB.BLOCK_OUT_END, TB.REMARKS, TB.RECURRENCE, TB.RECURRENCE_END_DATE

SELECT T1.ID,(case when LEN(T1.DISTRIBUTION_NAME) > 50 then CONCAT(subString(T1.DISTRIBUTION_NAME,1,50),'...') else T1.DISTRIBUTION_NAME END) as DISTRIBUTION_NAME,T1.SERVICE_CODE,T1.DELIVERY_MODE,T1.CREATED_DT,T3.DISPLAY_NAME as CREATED_BY,T2.RECIPIENTS_ROLE FROM distribution T1 JOIN distribution_role T2 ON T1.ID = T2.DISTRIBUTION_ID LEFT JOIN userAccountView T3 ON T3.id = T1.CREATED_BY WHERE 1 = 1 <#if status??> AND T1.STATUS = :status</#if> <#if description??> AND charindex(:description, DISTRIBUTION_NAME) > 0</#if> <#if remises_corr_id_in??> and RECIPIENTS_ROLE IN ${remises_corr_id_in} </#if> <#if service??> AND SERVICE_CODE =:service</#if> <#if mode??> AND T1.DELIVERY_MODE = :mode</#if>

SELECT T1.ID,T1.MSG_CONTENT,T1.MESSAGE_ID,T1.SUBJECT,(case when LEN(T1.MSG_NAME) > 50 then CONCAT(subString(T1.MSG_NAME,1,50),'...') else T1.MSG_NAME END) as MSG_NAME,T2.DISTRIBUTION_NAME,T1.DELIVERY_MODE,T1.SCHEDULE_SEND_DATE, T1.ACTUAL_SEND_DATE,T1.STATUS,SUBSTRING(DOC_NAME,1, LEN(DOC_NAME) - 1) DOC_NAME,T1.CREATED_BY,T1.CREATED_DT,T1.UPDATED_DT, T1.UPDATED_BY FROM email_sms_blast T1 LEFT JOIN distribution T2 ON T1.DISTRIBUTION_ID = T2.ID CROSS APPLY ( SELECT DOC_NAME + ', ' FROM email_sms_blast_attachment WHERE T1.ID = email_sms_blast_attachment.BLAST_ID FOR XML PATH('') ) D (DOC_NAME) WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.STATUS != 'CMSTAT002' <#if id??> AND T1.ID =:id</#if> <#if description??> AND charindex(:description, DISTRIBUTION_NAME) > 0 </#if> <#if msgName??> AND charindex(:msgName, MSG_NAME) > 0 </#if> <#if mode??> AND T1.DELIVERY_MODE = :mode</#if> <#if distribution??> AND DISTRIBUTION_ID = :distribution</#if> <#if start??> AND T1.SCHEDULE_SEND_DATE > CONVERT(datetime, :start, 103)</#if> <#if end??> AND T1.SCHEDULE_SEND_DATE < CONVERT(datetime, :end, 103)</#if>

SELECT DISTINCT T1.notification_id,T3.history_id,T1.notification_type,SUBSTRING(RECIPIENT_VALUE_ALL,1, LEN(RECIPIENT_VALUE_ALL) - 1) recipient,T1.sender,T1.subject,T1.content,T1.number_of_attempts, T2.file_name,T3.log_msg,T3.sent_time FROM notification T1 left JOIN notification_annex T2 ON T1.REQUEST_REF_NO = T2.request_ref_num left JOIN notification_history T3 ON T1.notification_id = T3.notification_id LEFT JOIN notification_recipient ON notification_recipient.notification_id = T1.notification_id CROSS APPLY ( SELECT notification_recipient.RECIPIENT_VALUE + ', ' FROM notification_recipient WHERE notification_recipient.notification_id = T1.notification_id FOR XML PATH('') ) D (RECIPIENT_VALUE_ALL) WHERE 1 = 1 <#if REQUEST_REF_NO??> and (T1.client_query_code =:REQUEST_REF_NO or T1.REQUEST_REF_NO =:REQUEST_REF_NO)</#if>

SELECT T1.notification_id,T1.REQUEST_REF_NO,T1.recipient,T1.sender,T1.subject,T1.status,T3.log_msg,T3.sent_time FROM notification T1 JOIN notification_annex T2 ON T1.REQUEST_REF_NO = T2.request_ref_num left JOIN (select N1.history_id,N1.notification_id,N1.sent_time,N1.log_msg from notification_history N1 JOIN (select max(history_id) as history_id from notification_history GROUP BY notification_id) N2 on N1.history_id = N2.history_id) T3 ON T1.notification_id = T3.notification_id WHERE 1 = 1 <#if start??> AND T3.sent_time > CONVERT(datetime, :start, 103)</#if> <#if end??> AND T3.sent_time < CONVERT(datetime, :end, 103)</#if>

SELECT DISTINCT T1.notification_id,T1.REQUEST_REF_NO,SUBSTRING(RECIPIENT_VALUE_ALL,1, LEN(RECIPIENT_VALUE_ALL) - 1) recipient,T1.sender,T1.subject,T1.status,T3.log_msg,T3.sent_time,T1.client_query_code FROM notification T1 LEFT JOIN notification_annex T2 ON T1.REQUEST_REF_NO = T2.request_ref_num LEFT JOIN notification_history T3 ON T3.notification_id = T1.notification_id LEFT JOIN notification_recipient ON notification_recipient.notification_id = T1.notification_id CROSS APPLY ( SELECT notification_recipient.RECIPIENT_VALUE + ', ' FROM notification_recipient WHERE notification_recipient.notification_id = T1.notification_id FOR XML PATH('') ) D (RECIPIENT_VALUE_ALL) WHERE (T1.status = '3' or T1.status = '1') <#if msg_id_in??> and client_query_code IN ${msg_id_in} </#if> <#if start??> AND T3.sent_time > CONVERT(datetime, :start, 103)</#if> <#if end??> AND T3.sent_time < CONVERT(datetime, :end, 103)</#if>

SELECT DISTINCT T1.id,T1.ID_NO,T1.ID_TYPE,T1.SALUTATION,T1.DISPLAY_NAME,T1.DESIGNATION,T1.ORGANIZATION_ID,T4.NAME as licenseeName, T1.OTHER_DESIGNATION,T1.STATUS,T3.ROLE_ID from user_account T1 left join (SELECT ROLE_ID,USER_ACCT_ID as USER_ACCT_ID from user_role WHERE ROLE_ID = 'ORG_ADMIN' and user_role.STATUS != 'CMSTAT002') T3 on T1.id = T3.USER_ACCT_ID left join licensee T4 on T4.ORGANIZATION_ID = T1.ORGANIZATION_ID left join organization T5 on T4.ORGANIZATION_ID = T5.ID WHERE T1.user_domain = 'internet' and T1.STATUS != 'CMSTAT002' <#if licenseeName??> and charindex(:licenseeName, T4.NAME) > 0 </#if> <#if uenNo??> and T5.UEN_NO = :uenNo</#if> <#if designation??> and T1.DESIGNATION = :designation</#if> <#if idNo??> and T1.ID_NO = :idNo</#if>
